name: Password Generator
topics: Set your requirements and generate a password using HTML, CSS, Javascript

name: Coding Quiz
topics: Test your coding knowledge! Answer a series of questions and save your score. Uses HTML, CSS, Javascript

name: Weather Forecast Dashboard
topics: Search for a city to see its current and upcoming weather info.  Uses external APIs, Javascript, Moment JS

name: Chop n Change Recipe Search
topics: Group project: search for great recipes using external APIs, Javascript and Bulma CSS

name: Tech Blog Site
topics: Log in and add, edit, remove blog posts. Comment on other people's posts. Uses MySQL database technology

name: Team Profile Generator
topics: Using the command line, type in the details of your team, and generate a team website. See demo video for more information.

name: eCommerce Back End
topics: Full back end system for an eCommerce website, including CRUD functionality.  See demo video for more information.

name: Bee Strong Fitness Subscriptions
topics: Group project: upload workouts as an instructor, and favourite videos as a student.  Technologies include Handlebars and Bcrypt.
